long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Centrify for Chrome is a free add-on that is a shortcut for Chromebook App Launcher. Once installed, it can be dragged into the App Launcher and Chromebook user can click to get single sign-on into Centrify User Portal.

Install the extension and start your 30-day free trial of full-functioning version of Centrify Identity Service: http://www.centrify.com/free-trial/identity-service-form/

Learn more about Centrify Identity Service and its available editions from:
https://www.centrify.com/products/identity-service/
https://www.centrify.com/products/identity-service/compare-editions/
